Package net.sf.freecol.client.gui.panel

Class DeclarationPanel.SignaturePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • net.sf.freecol.client.gui.panel.DeclarationPanel.SignaturePanel
  • Enclosing class:
    DeclarationPanel

    private class DeclarationPanel.SignaturePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A panel for displaying an animated signature. The panel should be initialized with a name before the animation is started.

    • Method Detail

      • getAbbreviatedName

        private java.lang.String getAbbreviatedName​(java.lang.String name)
        Gets an abbreviated version of the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to be abbreviated
        Returns:
        The abbreviated version of the given name. The name is made small enough to fit within the bounds the DeclarationPanel.

      • isTooLarge

        private boolean isTooLarge​(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if the given string is to large to be displayed within this panel.
        Parameters:
        name - The string to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the given string was to large to be fully displayed.

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.lang.String name)
        Initializes this panel with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to be used when making the signature.

      • addActionListener

        public void addActionListener​(java.awt.event.ActionListener al)
        Adds an ActionListener to this SignaturePanel. An event gets fired when the animation is stopped.
        Parameters:
        al - The ActionListener.
        See Also:
        startAnimation()

      • notifyStopped

        private void notifyStopped​()

      • startAnimation

        public void startAnimation​()
        Starts the animation of the signature. An ActionEvent gets sent to the registered listeners when the animation has stopped.
        See Also:
        addActionListener(ActionListener)
